testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the System Settings page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: And I set the Enable User Tours checkbox state to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: And The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then I click on the View Profile link
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: And I reset completed user-tours
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then I click on the View Profile link
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then I opt-out from user-tours
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then The user tour is not present on page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then I click on the View Profile link
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then I opt-in to user-tours
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then The user tour is present on page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: Then I end the user-tour
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify that opt-in/opt-out from user-tours button works

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Verify that user-tour shows up on the page and template is correct ?[90m# usertours/UserTour.feature:14?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI am on "Class Homepage" page of "?[0m?[32m?[1mDemonstration Class?[0m?[32m" class?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.navigateToClassHomepage(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mThe user tour is present on page?[0m ?[90m# UserTourSteps.assertUserTourPresent()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mThe user tour template is loaded correctly?[0m ?[90m# UserTourSteps.assertUserTourTemplateCorrect()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI navigate to the last step of the user-tour?[0m ?[90m# UserTourSteps.navigateToTheLastStep()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mThe user tour is present on page?[0m ?[90m# UserTourSteps.assertUserTourPresent()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mThe user tour template has next button transformed into end button?[0m ?[90m# UserTourSteps.assertNextButtonTransformedIntoEndButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI end the user-tour?[0m ?[90m# UserTourSteps.endUserTour()?[0m
